author: alejands
body:
#### PR description:

ECAL DPG requested to have the offline DQM plots ([example offline GUI](https://tinyurl.com/2ykhlsat)) from `PiZeroAnalyzer` in `DQMOffline/EGamma` available in online DQM as well. 
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/DQMOffline/EGamma/plugins/PiZeroAnalyzer.h
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/DQMOffline/EGamma/plugins/PiZeroAnalyzer.cc
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/DQMOffline/EGamma/python/piZeroAnalyzer_cfi.py


In order to do this, we have migrated the code above into a new ECAL DQM module `PiZeroTask` in `DQM/EcalMonitorTasks`, which can then create plots both online and offline.

This new code is functionally the same as the old analyzer but after discussing with DPG, we decided to leave the old analyzer code in to not break anything. Open to discussion.

Complimentary PR to dmwm/deployment:
- https://github.com/dmwm/deployment/pull/1155

#### PR validation:

Online DQM client run on test data. Offline DQM tested on relval WF 11634.511 (`runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 11634.511`). In both cases, the new plots were created successfully and matched the features of the old plots.


#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backports made to 12_4_X https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38570 and 12_3_X https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38571 to have this in time for the first 13.6 TeV stable collisions
title: Incorporate PiZeroAnalyzer code into ECAL DQM
